Summary: Appear to have the features and skills of a famous artist.

Name: Prying Eye
Summary: An invisible eye transmits what it sees to you.

Name: Ravening Maw
Summary: You evoke Zevgavizeb’s unceasing hunger and inflict it upon your target.

Name: Repelling Pulse
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Telekinetically knock creatures back and damage them with force.

Name: Return Beacon
Source: Pathfinder #166
Summary: You create a unique planar beacon somewhere within the spell's range that remains in place.

Name: Rewinding Step
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Anchor your location in time so you can quickly return.

Name: Rip the Spirit
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Tear at a living creature's spirit with negative energy to damage and drain it.

Name: Secret Chest
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Hide a container on the Ethereal Plane.

Name: Sending
Summary: Send a mental message to a creature anywhere on the planet and get a reply.

Name: Shadow Blast
Summary: Shape a cone of shadow to deal damage of a type you choose.

Name: Shadow Siphon
Summary: React to lessen the damage from an enemy's spell by making it partially illusion.

Name: Shadow Walk
Summary: Travel rapidly via the Shadow Plane.

Name: Strange Geometry
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Confoundingly warp spatial geometry, making passage difficult and destinations unpredictable.

Name: Subconscious Suggestion
Summary: Plant a mental suggestion that must be followed when a trigger occurs.

Name: Summon Entity
Summary: Conjure an aberration to fight on your behalf.

Name: Synaptic Pulse
Summary: Slow creatures with a mental blast.

Name: Synesthesia
Summary: Rewire a creature's senses.

Name: Telekinetic Haul
Summary: Move a large object.

Name: Telepathic Bond
Summary: Link minds with willing creatures to communicate telepathically at great distances.

Name: Temporary Glyph
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Quickly scribe a short-lived glyph to blast foes.

Name: Tongues
Summary: Let a creature understand and speak all languages.

Name: Wall of Flesh
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Spawn a wall of living flesh.

Name: Aura of the Unremarkable
Source: Pathfinder #166
Summary: You and allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing.

Name: Blanket of Stars
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: A cloak of darkness hides you in the dark and dazzles those who get too close.

Name: Blinding Fury
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Curse a creature that attacks you, making its victims become invisible to it.

Name: Cast into Time
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make a creature fall through time, damaging and sickening it.

Name: Catch Your Name
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You learn a private name (but not the true name) of the creature who spoke your name, as well as their precise location, unless they succeed at a Will save to negate the effect.

Name: Chromatic Image
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Colorful mirror images damage foes who destroy them.

Name: Collective Transposition
Summary: Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.

Name: Dominate
Summary: A creature must obey your orders.

Name: Feeblemind
Summary: Stupefy a creature permanently.

Name: Mislead
Summary: Turn invisible and create a duplicate of yourself who acts like you.

Name: Phantasmal Calamity
Summary: Damage a creature mentally with visions of an apocalypse.

Name: Repulsion
Summary: Prevent creatures from approaching you.

Name: Scintillating Safeguard
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Reactively protect multiple creatures from harm with a magic barrier.

Name: Scrying
Summary: Spy on a creature.

Name: Spellwrack
Summary: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.

Name: Spirit Blast
Summary: Damage a creature's spiritual essence.

Name: Teleport
Summary: Transport you and willing creatures a great distance.

Name: Temporal Ward
Source: Pathfinder #173
Summary: You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it.

Name: True Seeing
Summary: See through illusions and transmutations.

Name: Unexpected Transposition
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: React to switch places with a creature.

Name: Vampiric Exsanguination
Summary: Draw blood and life force from creatures in a cone.

Name: Vibrant Pattern
Summary: Make a pattern of lights that dazzles and blinds.

Name: Wall of Force
Summary: Create an invisible and durable wall of magical force.

Name: Zealous Conviction
Summary: Instill unshakable conviction and zeal in willing creatures.

Name: Zero Gravity
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Remove gravity in an area.

Name: Blightburn Blast
Source: Pathfinder #155
Summary: Inflict a creature with blightburn sickness.

Name: Dimensional Lock
Summary: Prevent teleportation and planar travel.

Name: Duplicate Foe
Summary: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy that fights for you.

Name: Energy Aegis
Summary: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, and sonic.

Name: Ethereal Jaunt
Summary: Use the Ethereal Plane to move through objects and into the air.

Name: Force Cage
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Form a prison of pure magical force.

Name: Inexhaustible Cynicism
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make creatures paranoid and cynical.

Name: Leng Sting
Source: Pathfinder #160
Summary: You use the power of nightmares to magically replicate the venomous attack of the aberrant and cunning Leng spiders.

Name: Magnificent Mansion
Summary: Conjure a secure dwelling in a demiplane.

Name: Mask of Terror
Summary: A creature’s fearsome illusory appearance frightens observers.

Name: Maze of Locked Doors
Summary: The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway.

Name: Plane Shift
Summary: Transport creatures to another plane of existence.

Name: Possession
Summary: Send your mind and soul into another creature’s body.

Name: Prismatic Armor
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Multicolored armor dazzles foes and protects against many damage types.

Name: Prismatic Spray
Summary: Shoot rainbow beams that have various effects on creatures in a cone.

Name: Project Image
Summary: Make an illusion of yourself you can cast spells through.

Name: Retrocognition
Summary: Sense impressions of past events at your location.

Name: Return to Essence
Source: Pathfinder #173
Summary: You unravel the magic of a spell that affects a container, door, or lock, converting it into energy you can repurpose to power your own spells.

Name: Reverse Gravity
Summary: Flip the gravitational pull in an area.

Name: Shadow Raid
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: A swarm of illusory shadows damages foes in the area and provides concealment.

Name: Tempest of Shades
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Summon an incarnate tornado of undead shades to drain and frighten foes.

Name: Time Beacon
Summary: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong.

Name: True Target
Summary: You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm.

Name: Visions of Danger
Summary: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.

Name: Warp Mind
Summary: Confuse a creature, possibly permanently.

Name: Antimagic Field
Summary: Magic doesn't function in an area around you.

Name: Canticle of Everlasting Grief
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Mournful dirge frightens and mentally damages a foe, preventing its bonuses.

Name: Devour Life
Summary: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force.

Name: Disappearance
Summary: Make a creature invisible, silent, and undetectable by any and all senses.

Name: Discern Location
Summary: Discover a target's exact location within unlimited range.

Name: Dream Council
Summary: Communicate through a shared dream.

Name: Maze
Summary: Trap a creature in an extradimensional maze.

Name: Mind Blank
Summary: Protect a creature from mental magic and some divinations.

Name: Prismatic Wall
Summary: Form a protective wall with seven chromatic layers.

Name: Prying Survey
Summary: You create eight invisible, floating eyes, each about 3 inches in diameter, that scan the area around you, transmitting rough impressions of the environment.

Name: Scintillating Pattern
Summary: Cause an array of color that dazzles, confuses, and stuns.

Name: Spirit Song
Summary: Sing an eldritch song that damages any creature that has a spirit.

Name: Spiritual Epidemic
Summary: Weaken a target with a communicable curse.

Name: Uncontrollable Dance
Summary: Overcome a target with an all-consuming urge to dance.

Name: Undermine Reality
Summary: You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real.

Name: Unrelenting Observation
Summary: You and other creatures use scrying to track a subject exactly.

Name: Astral Labyrinth
Summary: You connect the entire area with an invisible maze of astral energy that interferes with dimensional and mental magic.

Name: Bind Soul
Summary: Imprison a dead creature's soul.

Name: Divinity Leech
Source: Pathfinder #162
Summary: You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power.

Name: Foresight
Summary: Sense when a creature is in danger and react to protect it with good fortune.

Name: Overwhelming Presence
Summary: Take on the majesty of a god.

Name: Prismatic Shield
Source: Pathfinder #162
Summary: Shield-sized shards of multicolored light manifest in the air around you, each rotating quickly to intercept attacks.

Name: Prismatic Sphere
Summary: Form a protective sphere composed of seven chromatic layers.

Name: Proliferating Eyes
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You implant a contagious, scrying eye that spreads to others by touch.

Name: Resplendent Mansion
Summary: Conjure a mansion that lasts for a day.

Name: Telepathic Demand
Summary: Send a mental message that impels a creature toward a course of action.

Name: Unfathomable Song
Summary: Song debilitates creatures in weird ways.

Name: Unspeakable Shadow
Source: Secrets of Magic
Traits: Death, Emotion, Fear, Illusion, Mental, Shadow, Visual
Summary: Transform a creature's shadow into a frightening monster and make them flee or fight it.

Name: Voracious Gestalt
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Create a spirit gestalt that eats souls and grows stronger.

Name: Wail of the Banshee
Summary: Scream, dealing damage and draining creatures.

Name: Weird
Summary: Frighten, deal mental damage, and possibly kill large numbers of creatures.

Name: Alter Reality
Summary: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.

Name: Fabricated Truth
Summary: Make creatures believe something is fact.

Name: Fated Confrontation
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Isolate two fated opponents and let them twist each other's fate.

Name: Gate
Summary: Tear open a portal to another plane.

Name: Indestructibility
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Become briefly immune to everything.

Name: Nullify
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.

Name: Remake
Summary: Recreate a destroyed object.

Name: Shadow Army
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Duplicate yourself to have your shadows fight enemies as you hide amongst them.

Name: Time Stop
Summary: Briefly stop time for everything but you.
